  • Method Details

    • onFailure

      void onFailure(@NotNull @NotNull Consumer<Collection<? extends Signal>> signalAction)
      Set the action in case of failure (and alert)

      If there are no errors, the action is not performed

      Parameters:
      signalAction - action to be taken in case of failure
